preibisch_imagelib2

Interface RealPositionable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EuclideanSpace, Positionable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RealOutOfBounds<T>, RealRandomAccess<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPositionableTransform, Floor, FloorInterpolator, FloorOffset, InverseDistanceWeightingInterpolator, LanczosInterpolator, NearestNeighborInterpolator, NearestNeighborSearchInterpolator, NLinearInterpolator, NLinearInterpolator1D, NLinearInterpolator2D, NLinearInterpolator3D, NLinearInterpolatorARGB, RealOutOfBoundsRealRandomAccess, RealPoint, RefinedPeak, Round

    public interface RealPositionable
extends Positionable
    An element that can be positioned in n-dimensional real space.
    Author:
    Tobias Pietzsch, Stephan Preibisch, Stephan Saalfeld, Stephan Saalfeld
